Our third and last result deals with K¨ahler–Ricci solitons (KRS). Recall that a K¨ahler metric
is a KRS if there exists a holomorphic vector field

. K¨ahler–Ricci solitons are important generalizations of K¨ahler–Einstein metrics which arise
in the study of the K¨ahler–Ricci flow. Our next result show that KRS cannot arise as K¨ahler–Ricci
iterations of metrics induced by complex space forms.
